page.title: 11GARRETT HALL FARM
page.content: THIS{200 YEAR OLD}FARM, IS NOW USED BY AN IMPORTANT{PEDIGREE AYRSHIRE} MILKING HERD. THE 130 CATTLE BRED BY{ {MR.PATRICK}WERE INTRODUCED TO THIS AREA IN{1958.} THE FARM WAS THE FOCAL POINT FOR 200 AYRSHIRE CATTLE BREEDERS FROM GREAT BRITAIN,{IN MAY 1985. GARRETT HALL {BIBBY 16TH}WON FIRST PRIZE IN THE{ {HEIFER INSPECTION IN 1980. } MR. PATRICK HAS RENTED 100 ACRES FROM {BRIDGEWATER ESTATES.}IN RECENT YEARS HE HAS CHANGED THE MILKING SYSTEM AND HE MADE THESE CHANGES BECAUSE IT ONLY TAKES ONE PERSON TO FEED SILAGE FOR TWO COWS.THE SYSTEM IS A LOT EASIER, QUICKER AND HAS NO PROBLEMS WITH THE COWS.BECAUSE THE AREA IS OWNED BY BRIDGEWATER ESTATES{FARMING MAY ONLY {LAST FOR 20 YEARS.}THEY HAVE{75 CALVES {A YEAR }AND{395,000 LITRES }OF MILK{A {YEAR. }
